reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed the hotel for 4 nights. The hotel was located in the good area. I stayed the most expensive room. The room was fairy big and had fantastic view. However, the bath was not so clean and shower was not powerful enough, so I saved the water in the bucket and cleaned the body everyday. If you are not in the top room, you may have better shower, as the boiler is not too close. Anyway, you can have nice view from other room, too. Just the balcony is smaller than the top room.
reviews.title: good manager

reviews.text: We also used the laundry, but one t shirt was distroyed. If you are using, you should check the number of piece and do not give them expensive clothes.
reviews.title: Stay for the friendly management.

reviews.text: The manager was very kind. He was very peaceful and kind man. We felt very welcoming from him. Even though, I had few small problem, I might go back to this hotel again, as he was nice.
reviews.title: A Home Away from Home

reviews.text: Mcleodganj does not have great restaurant for tourists. If you are backpackers, it is good place. But if you are in India for few days, you do not want to eat at dirty places. The best option was the surya hotel restaurant which is same street as Kareri lodge. The place was clean and food was good.
reviews.title: Loved superb view
